Body:
Managed portfolios suitability REMINDER

We are required to annually assess your suitability for investment into managed portfolios.

Almost 12 months have passed since you last reviewed your information. Please take a few moments to ensure your details are up to date.

If you do not confirm your information before the end of the 12-month period, restrictions will be activated on your managed portfolio.
Title: Notification of Annual Suitability Review
